skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sai aartis
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sai Aarti is a part of the pooja to Sai Baba. It means, the songs sung in praise of the deity (Sai Baba) when the light is being offered. These are Original Sai Aartis in Marathi. Cherish the meaning of the Aarti lyrics, their nectar and importance. There are four Aartis performed daily to Sai Baba namely, Morning Aarti, Noon Aarti, Evening Aarti and Night Aarti. Marathi version is the original version and subsequently were translated into other languages!

Sai Aartis in Marathi is a part of our popular Shirdi Sai Baba All-In-One App across app stores and is by OmniSai.Org, a US 501(C)(3) Nonprofit Organization. We have App users / Site visitors from 150 countries, 49 states in USA, all 29 states in India and from ~3000 cities Worldwide. The most comprehensive Free "App / Resource For And by Sai Volunteers!". No Ads, No Hidden Agenda! We do not collect user data or monetize through any means. Simply experience the best! We intend to never advertise in our apps or on our website and intend to keep this service always FREE.
